revised_title: Minute British Shells: Discoveries and Descriptions by John Lightfoot
tldr: In this article, John Lightfoot describes and illustrates three unique British shells, focusing on their morphology, internal structure, and habitat. He discusses the differences between the shells and their classification within the Nautilus and Helix genera. Lightfoot also compares his findings to previous works on minute shells and provides details on where these shells can be found.
